mapper.select: SELECT uw.userid,uwi.nickname FROM tab_user_weixin_info uwi,tab_user_weixin uw WHERE uw.userid=#{userid} AND uw.openid=uwi.openid AND uw.wxserverid=uwi.wxserverid ORDER BY uwi.createtime DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT FROM tab_user_weixin_info WHERE openid=#{openid} limit 1

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tab_user_weixin_info ( subscribe, openid, nickname, sex, language, city, province, country, headimgurl, subscribe_time, wxserverid, createtime ) VALUES ( #{subscribe}, #{openid}, #{nickname}, #{sex}, #{language}, #{city}, #{province}, #{country}, #{headimgurl}, #{subscribeTime}, #{wxserverid}, #{createtime} )
